about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Cospower Engineering Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of electrical panels, equipment mounting structure, harmonic filters, and substation. It is also involved in offering turnkey services such as commissioning, installation, comprehensive maintenance, supply, and testing of electric products. The company also purchases a few products from other companies.

Cospower Engineering has a trained team to deal with various turnkey services for safe & proper functioning of electrical distribution equipment. The company manufactures and supplies the products on a contract basis as per customer requirements.

The manufacturing unit of the company is located at Vasai, Maharashtra. The facility is well-equipped with the required machinery and equipment.

Competitive Strengths

1. ISO certified organization
2. Wide product range
3. In-house manufacturing unit

faqs.question: What is the Cospower Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer:
Cospower Engineering IPO is a SME IPO of 400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.04 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 17, 2020, and closes on March 19, 2020.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Cospower Engineering IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Cospower Engineering IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Cospower Engineering IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Cospower Engineering IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Cospower Engineering IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Cospower Engineering IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Cospower Engineering IPO opens on March 17, 2020 and closes on March 19, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Cospower Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer: Cospower Engineering IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Cospower Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Cospower Engineering IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
